allEpisode.title: Marketing Automation With Customer.io + Next.js
allEpisode.description: Joel hooks has been building full-featured marketing automation using Nextjs & Customer.io for some of the most popular dev education sites out there. In this episode, he'll share how it's done!

allEpisode.title: Let's Learn tRPC!
allEpisode.description: The promise of tRPC is end-to-end typesafe APIs. In this episode, Alex / KATT will teach us what that means and how we can get started using tRPC in a React app.

allEpisode.title: Build an App With Supabase and NextJS
allEpisode.description: Supabase combines database storage and authentication into a powerful workflow for web devs. In this episode, Jon Meyers will teach us how to build a Next.js app with Supabase and deploy it to Netlify!

allEpisode.title: What Can You Automate With n8n?
allEpisode.description: Used wisely, automation is a huge time saver. In this episode, we'll learn about all the incredible things we can automate using n8n from Harshil Agrawal!

allEpisode.title: Learn About Islands Architecture With Slinkity
allEpisode.description: Partial hydration lets you ship zero JS by default. In this episode, Ben Holmes will teach us how Slinkity lets us use any component framework to build low-JS dynamic apps on the Jamstack.

allEpisode.title: Planning (and Publishing) Better Content
allEpisode.description: When it comes to content strategy, Stephanie Morillo is one of the best out there. In this episode, she'll teach us how to plan, write, and — most importantly — *ship* great content consistently!
